Summary: Hal Jordan was dying long before a mission went wrong and his heart finally gave out. He was dying when he signed the divorce papers. Dying without making it anyone else’s problem. Or, Hal gets kidnapped by your average Gotham crazy wanting to get a step ahead of Batman and ends up being saved like a damsel in distress. Bruce is, surprisingly, overprotective—bordering on solicitous—about the whole thing.
